title: The Unjust Steward
itunes:title: The Unjust Steward
description: In a puzzling parable, Jesus praises a man who is a self-absorbed cheat. What the Lord notices in the man's dubious behavior are three things of spiritual importance: he knows that he is in crisis; he makes an honest self-assessment; and, most importantly, he acts.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
